CustomField.description: Developed as a part of approval process Ticket BIZ-46489 Update for BIZ-45146
CustomField.formula: IF(Free_Months__c = 0 ,0, IF(Free_Months__c = 1 && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c > 10000),1, IF((Free_Months__c >= 1 && Free_Months__c <= 3) && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c < 10000),1, IF(Free_Months__c = 2,2, IF(Free_Months__c = 3,3, IF(Free_Months__c > 3 && (ACV_Change_Year_1__c < 10000),8, 5)))) ))
CustomField.label: Free month approver Level
